snippet: The median sales price for Manhattan apartments held steady, while the number of sales during the quarter was up by more than 15 percent.
lead_paragraph: The median sales price for Manhattan apartments held steady, while the number of sales during the quarter was up by more than 15 percent.

headline.main: Flat Prices but More Manhattan Home Sales
headline.print_headline: Flat Prices but More Manhattan Home Sales
headline.seo: Rise in Sales Helps Manhattan Housing Market Recover
